name: bakery_get_all_products
description:
Get all bakery products in the catalog.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of all bakery products

name: bakery_get_product_by_id
description:
Get detailed information about a specific bakery product.

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product

Returns:
    Product details including ingredients, allergens, and dietary info

name: bakery_search_products
description:
Search bakery products with multiple filters including dietary restrictions.

Args:
    query: General search term (matches name, description, ingredients)
    category: Filter by category (e.g., "Bread", "Pastries", "Cakes", "Cookies")
    max_price: Maximum price filter
    max_calories: Maximum calories filter
    vegan: Only show vegan products
    gluten_free: Only show gluten-free products
    dairy_free: Only show dairy-free products
    nut_free: Only show nut-free products
    in_stock_only: Only show products currently in stock
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 20)

Returns:
    List of matching products

name: bakery_get_products_by_category
description:
Get bakery products by category.

Args:
    category: Category to filter by (e.g., "Bread", "Pastries", "Cakes", "Cookies", "Savory")
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of products in the specified category

name: bakery_get_dietary_options
description:
Get bakery products matching specific dietary requirements.

Args:
    vegan: Only show vegan products
    gluten_free: Only show gluten-free products
    dairy_free: Only show dairy-free products
    nut_free: Only show nut-free products
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 50)

Returns:
    List of products meeting the dietary criteria

name: bakery_get_categories
description:
Get all available product categories.

Returns:
    List of unique categories

name: bakery_get_products_in_stock
description:
Get all products that are currently in stock.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of products to return (default 100)

Returns:
    List of products with stock > 0

name: bakery_get_todays_specials
description:
Get today's daily specials with discounted prices.

Returns:
    List of today's special items with regular and special prices

name: bakery_get_specials_for_day
description:
Get daily specials for a specific day of the week.

Args:
    day_of_week: Day name (e.g., "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday")

Returns:
    List of special items for that day

name: bakery_get_weekly_specials
description:
Get all daily specials for the entire week.

Returns:
    All specials organized by day of the week

name: bakery_get_cake_customization_options
description:
Get all available options for customizing a cake.

Returns:
    All customization options organized by type (size, flavor, frosting, etc.)

name: bakery_get_cake_options_by_type
description:
Get cake customization options for a specific type.

Args:
    option_type: Type of option (e.g., "size", "flavor", "frosting", "filling", "decoration")

Returns:
    Available options for the specified type

name: bakery_calculate_custom_cake_price
description:
Calculate the price for a custom cake based on selected options.

Args:
    size: Cake size (e.g., "6-inch", "8-inch", "10-inch", "12-inch", "sheet")
    flavor: Cake flavor (e.g., "vanilla", "chocolate", "red-velvet", "carrot", "lemon")
    frosting: Frosting type (e.g., "buttercream", "cream-cheese", "fondant", "whipped")
    filling: Optional filling (e.g., "none", "fruit", "mousse", "ganache", "custard")
    decoration: Optional decoration level (e.g., "simple", "moderate", "elaborate", "custom")

Returns:
    Price breakdown and total for the custom cake

name: bakery_create_preorder
description:
Create a pre-order for bakery items or custom cakes.

Args:
    items: List of items to order, each with 'product_id' and 'quantity' OR
           'custom_cake' with cake options
    pickup_date: Desired pickup date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
    pickup_time: Desired pickup time (HH:MM format, e.g., "10:00", "14:30")
    special_instructions: Any special requests or instructions

Returns:
    Pre-order confirmation with order details

name: bakery_get_my_preorders
description:
Get all pre-orders for the current user.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of pre-orders with their status

name: bakery_get_preorder_details
description:
Get details of a specific pre-order.

Args:
    preorder_id: The pre-order ID

Returns:
    Pre-order details including items, pickup info, and status

name: bakery_cancel_preorder
description:
Cancel a pending pre-order.

Args:
    preorder_id: The pre-order ID to cancel

Returns:
    Cancellation confirmation or error

name: bakery_buy_product
description:
Purchase a bakery product immediately (for in-stock items).

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product to purchase
    quantity: Number of items to buy (default 1)

Returns:
    Purchase confirmation or error message

name: bakery_check_availability
description:
Check if a product is available in the requested quantity.

Args:
    product_id: The unique ID of the product
    quantity: Number of items needed (default 1)

Returns:
    Availability status and stock information

name: bakery_get_purchase_history
description:
Get the current user's purchase history.

Args:
    limit: Maximum number of records to return (default 50)

Returns:
    List of purchase records with product details

name: bakery_get_purchase_stats
description:
Get purchase statistics for the current user.

Returns:
    Statistics including total transactions, items bought, and favorites

name: bakery_get_current_user
description:
Get the current logged-in customer's profile information.

Returns information about the currently authenticated customer including
their name, loyalty points, dietary preferences, and known allergies.

Returns:
    User profile with contact info, loyalty status, and dietary info
